spec_data.Name: perl-App-grindperl
spec_data.Description:
Hacking on the Perl source tree requires one to regularly build and test. The
grindperl tool helps automate some common configuration, build and test tasks.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 07:20:39 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Command-line tool to help build and test blead perl
